content.prompt: Which of the following factors is most typically used to explain why the Cold War ended?

choices.label: Covert wars in Afghanistan and Latin America ended in communist victories.
Nuclear rearmament by the Reagan administration intimidated the Soviet Union’s leaders.
Strong United States diplomacy along with Soviet economic problems contributed to political changes in the Soviet Union.
Soviet leaders’ reassertion of control over Eastern Europe resulted in revolutionary protests and uprisings.

topic.text: 9.3: The End of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
